creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Modify the UI so that the usecase to add groups to users or users to groups to allow for multiple select. This would prevent requiring multiple operations that should be easily done in one step.

On the user's page, a set of checkboxes - one for each group - might be another option.

BTW, we have to define a policy re. the usage of AJAX. This would be a nice usecase for drag&drop or something similar.
